LanguageData.WaitToRemove: You can remove the blood god spot again in {0}
LanguageData.RemoveDesc: Removes the blood god spot so it can be placed somewhere else
LanguageData.SacrificeMyself: Sacrifice myself to the blood god
LanguageData.NobodyCanSacrifice: Cannot find someone that is capable holding the ritual
LanguageData.BloodGodScaleHelp: Blood god dissatisfaction level. Once it reaches 100% bad things will happen to your colonists. Sacrifice a colonist at the blood god spot to satisfy the blood god.
LanguageData.ColonistBecomesDumberText: {0} had a brain accident and got dumber
